headline: Lennar Announces Further Extension of Expiration Date of Exchange Offer
summary: Lennar Corporation (NYSE: LEN and LEN.B) ("Lennar") announced today that in view of the continuation of the government shutdown, during which the Securities and Exchange Commission ("SEC") will not declare registration statements effective, Lennar is further extending the expiration date for its previously announced offer to exchange the approximately 20% it owns of the total outstanding shares of Millrose Properties, Inc. (NYSE: MRP) ("Millrose") for outstanding shares of Lennar Class A common
